labels.title: 37.284E
labels.content: Daggers such as this one, with two parallel ribs running down the blade, have been found throughout modern Israel. The design is undoubtedly Asian, probably Hyksos. How such a blade reached Thebes is not known; it may have been brought back as a souvenir by a Theban soldier who fought in the wars against the Hyksos.

collections.name: Egyptian, Classical, Ancient Near Eastern Art
